attributes.action: UK government to officially recognise Sealand as a fully independent principality
attributes.additional_details:
As yet the the United Kingdom, like every other sovereign state does not recognise the Sealand (a country set up by Major Roy Paddy Bates, on an abandoned WW2 Fort) as an independent nation.

We the undersigned hereby call on the government to recognise Sealand as a sovereign state, becoming the first to do so.
